definition: all year round
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
grain/harvest (old)/variant of 年[nian2]
surname Nian
year/CL:個|个[ge4]
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
suffix for nouns
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It is neither too cold nor too hot in Kunming ____ ____ ____ ____.
sentences.chinese: 在昆明，天气一年到头都是既不太冷也不太热。

sentences.english: The sun shines here all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 这里一年到头都能照到太阳。

sentences.english: Our events and happenings calendar is ' chock-a-block ' all year round.
sentences.chinese: 我们的赛事和活动日程表一年到头都是满满当当的。

sentences.english: My father sits at his desk writing his book year in and year out.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲一年到头总坐在写字台旁写他的书。

sentences.english: Are flowers in bloom all the year round there?
sentences.chinese: 那里一年到头百花盛开吗？

sentences.english: Old Joe toils year in and year out on his small patch of land.
sentences.chinese: 老乔一年到头都在他那一小块地里辛勤劳作。

sentences.english: B: I grow a variety of things, so that something is in bloom all year round.
sentences.chinese: 我种好多种东西，所以一年到头都有花开。

sentences.english: Adding insulation can help keep your home comfortable all year round.
sentences.chinese: 在家加一个隔离层可以让你一年到头都感到舒适。

sentences.english: They get fired all the time, because they can’t do their job.
sentences.chinese: 他们一年到头都在被解雇，因为他们不能完成工作。

sentences.english: Only 600 people live here year round.
sentences.chinese: 这里一年到头只住着六百人。

sentences.english: Year-round temperatures have risen by 5 degrees F and the surrounding ocean is warming.
sentences.chinese: 一年到头的气温上升了5华摄，周边的海域也在升温。

sentences.english: Only in China do stationery shops have rows of "For my Teacher" cards on sale twelve months of the year.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，文具店里的敬师卡一年到头都畅销。

sentences.english: You can buy strawberries all year round, but at a price.
sentences.chinese: 草莓一年到头都买得到，不过很贵。

definition: to leave early and return late (idiom)
to be industrious, rising early and going to bed late
at the Chinese New Year or other festivities
to celebrate the Chinese New Year
every day
see 起早貪黑|起早贪黑[qi3 zao3 tan1 hei1]
(coll.) farmer
to tire oneself out through overwork/to work oneself to death
all day long/the whole day
to rush about/to be constantly on the move
to be busy rushing about/to bustle about
tight fitting/hard up (i.e. lacking money)
all year round/for years on end/average year
exhausting/hard/tough/arduous/to work hard/to go to a lot of trouble/hardship(s)
see 掙扎|挣扎[zheng1 zha2]
to struggle to get free/to strive to acquire/to make (money)
several years
